alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 1:57AM MDT until July 22 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kingsbury County in east central South Dakota... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Bryant, or 11 miles north of Lake Thompson State Recreation Area, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Preston around 310 AM CDT. Badger around 315 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hetland and Arlington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
